strategy_reasoning: Using the 'cozy pixel art' aesthetic to translate technical updates (infrastructure, UI changes, new models) into emotional concepts like 'leveling up', 'tending the garden', and 'strengthening roots'. This makes abstract tech feel warm and approachable.
visual_style: Studio Ghibli meets Stardew Valley. Chunky 8-bit sprites, soft pastel gradients (mint/peach/lavender), and prominent use of lime green #ecf874 for magical glow effects.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art scene of a tiny bee character wearing pixelated headphones, floating in a retro creative studio. The bee is conducting a symphony of glowing floating screens showing video loops and art. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in floating pixel font: 'LEVEL UP'. Nostalgic, magical atmosphere, emotionally warm.
images.description: Visualizing the audio/video model updates as a magical creative studio.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit game UI screen showing a 'Garden Inventory'. Clean, organized pixel art icons of documents, tools, and paintbrushes arranged neatly. Background is a soft pastel peach and mint gradient. A tiny pixel cursor hovers over a 'Redesign' button. Cozy vibes like the game Unpacking. Soft lime green (#ecf874) borders and accents. Peaceful, satisfying, organized workspace.
images.description: Metaphor for the UI redesign and docs merge - organizing the chaos into a cozy inventory.

images.prompt: Cross-section pixel art view of a digital garden. Above ground: beautiful 8-bit flowers blooming in soft lime green (#ecf874) sunlight. Underground: tiny cute pixel robots and bees working together to strengthen the deep roots. Warm earth tones and pastel gradients. Represents infrastructure and agents helping agents. Lo-fi, detailed, emotionally warm, like A Short Hike.
images.description: Visualizing 'infrastructure hardening' and 'agents' as the roots of the garden.
